column4: Now the dvd plays, ive got a visual, but it flickers. Anyone can help me?
are you using an ATI card ??
yes I have ATI card, what is compiz?
Compiz is installed, so I think i use it
but do you have it enabled ??
No idea, I havent done anything to put it on ...
Do I need to enable it maek
well flickering is a problem when playing full screen video while Compiz is enabled on an ATI card
you may have to update to the latest ATI drivers using envy
well it was not in full screen
allready installed latest ati with envy
Right click on the desktop "change desktop background" then click on "visual effects" tab
